channel.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

image.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.16.0.ULIMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 Lite Global

Codename: taoyao

Version: OS1.0.16.0.ULIMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.0 GB

MD5: c6a92405f691f643475182c2d5256da3

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Frame drops and stuttering issues in Honor of Kings
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to March 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here
